body.p: To play tic tac toe, you will need two players, a flat surface, and a drawing utensil. The game “board” is a 3 x 3 grid. During the game, each player will take turns drawing an X or an O in the empty squares of the grid. The first player to create a straight line of three X’s or O’s wins the game. If the grid is filled without either player achieving the line of three, the game is a tie.

section.title: Playing The Game
section.p: Before you begin, decide who will start the game, who will play using X, and who will play using O.
section.note: You can only fill one square per turn.

ol.li: Player 1: draw an X in any empty square.
Player 2: draw a Y in any empty square.
Repeat steps 2 and 3 until there is a winner or the game ends in a tie.

section.title: Possible Game Outcomes
section.p: The line of three can be vertical, horizontal, or diagonal. The line of three can appear in any row, any column or from any corner.
